website_summaries.verdict: Durable, comfortable, and less expensive than other organic sheets.
pros: Holds up well to washing and drying
Elastic all around the edge for a snug fit
cons: May have a slight chemical smell at first, but it fades with time and washing

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bedding
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are incredibly soft, we bought these for our little ones pack n' play and it fits a bit loose ( we have a Graco Playard) but that has never been a problem. The color of the sheets shown in the picture is slightly darker than the picture shown above. Well made, easy to wash (8 months, still going strong), great quality. Please click YES if this was helpful :)
customer_reviews.author: M.Mae.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these sheets for the Nuna Sena full-size playard
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my Nuna Sena full size playard. The Nuna name-brand sheets are SO expensive, but their mattress size is not very common, so after much searching, I was thrilled to finally find much cheaper sheets for it--and they're even made of organic cotton! I was very concerned that any sheets I buy not be too baggy, and therefore a suffocation hazard, but these fit perfectly. They are also VERY soft. I highly recommend these sheets for the Nuna Sena full-size playard, or any other playard with matching specs.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Color was deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for size and what I thought was more of a tan color. It’s more like an off white color. Still very much what I need and I will be using in my Arms Reach Co-Sleeper. I have The Original Co-Sleeper®; this model is discontinued (40” x 28” x 31”). This also fits the Mallard Memory Foam Pack ‘N’ Topper (26” x 37.5” x 2”) and hooks over the bottom part of the Co-Sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Cat B.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Light “Sage”
customer_reviews.text: This sheet appears and feels to be of very good quality. It’s very soft. My only complaint is that I don’t feel that the color is actually “sage”. The color depicted seems a bit darker than what I received. I was hoping for something with just a tiny bit more hints of evergreen to it, but what I received seems like it would be more closely considered a variation of seafoam. Again, the quality is nice, but for anyone who is picky about color, just know this is a lighter, less rustic “sage”.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Louise

customer_reviews.title: Arms reach mini cosleeper sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and works great for arms reach mini cosleeper! Super snug fit, much better price than arms reach mini cosleeper brand sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Healing Cave Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fits on Chicco Lullago Bassinet Pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading another review saying it will fit on the Chicco Lullago Bassinet pad. It is a bit tight, but it works well. I used the Carter's Keep Me Dry Water Resistant Mattress Protector Pad and then this sheet on top. Once you stretch it a little bit, it works just fine. It's very soft and I think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Modesto

customer_reviews.title: Color is a little off but good material
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to buy this certain green, expect it to be off in color. It’s more of light pea green than it is the sage color I was hoping to get. Basically, it’s not the same color as the picture. However the material isn’t bad and the price is even better. It ended up not looking awful I’m nursery so I just kept it
customer_reviews.author: Tara Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Soft Sheet, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sheet so much I purchased the same thing in standard crib size. These sheets are very soft and wash well. No pilling or shrinking. These are my two biggest issues with bassinet and crib sheets. Often after one or two washes they no longer fit the mattress and I end up wrestling them on or worse, ripping them. Cheaper bassinet sheets have shrunk and, while they can be stretched to fit, end up warping the thin bassinet mattresses. I purchased this for a custom-made bassinet mattress that I didn't want ruined by too-tight sheets. It fit the non-standard size beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Keribeth

customer_reviews.title: Soft and convenient.  Can i get one for my Bed?
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is nice and soft and was great to put in our pack and play. it was nice to use a sheet so that you could tear it off if there was an accident of some sorts and wash this while the "mattress" of the pack and play would stay relatively clean. This will not stop all messes but it was easy on and off. We used this quite a bit when our kid was young as we didn't use a basinet, but started with the pack and play before moving him to his crib when mom went back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Adams Family

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the true color
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say the color is sage, it’s more mint green which was pretty disappointing as I was really wanting a more desert sage color for my desert/cactus themed nursery. These will just have to be back up sheets for the late night accident sheet change unfortunately:(
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Willers

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one and you and your baby will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sheet. It is incredibly soft and I am now purchasing the similar sheet for my full-size crib. We have the GoCrib portable crib and the mattress is an air up one. I've looked endlessly and wasted a lot of money on finding sheets that don't make it fold up or pucker. This sheet only has elastic on the corners instead of all around the edges and I think it helps a lot with keeping the mattress flat.
customer_reviews.author: cafrank

customer_reviews.title: I would sleep on these
customer_reviews.text: The sheets feel very soft and fit well on our graco pack and play. They clean up nicely as we've washed them around 10 times by this point with various different type of excrements from our little one. They still look great and thanks quality is much better than Graco's own sheets If they were on my bed I don't think I would have any complaints. Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Skoo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE HOW SOFT THESE ARE!
customer_reviews.text: These amazing organic cotton sheets are the softest ever! (Good thing since I bought them for my very FIRST grandchild!) I bought a couple to try and ended up buying two more. I love how soft and smooth they are. They don't bunch up or bead up like some cotton fabrics do and, despite frequent washing, they hold their neutral, gentle color and shape. I love giving my precious granddaughter the very best with these unbleached, organic cotton fitted sheets. They fit the pack and play mat perfectly and still somehow fit the separate pack and play MATTRESS (see my other reviews!) perfectly too. I only wish they made these in KING size for MY bed too!
customer_reviews.author: pixieforpapa

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuna SENA Aire (full) travel crib
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an organic alternative to the 40$ Nuna sheet to fit SENA Aire, full. Just tried this on Nuna mattress and it fits well. Seems fine for the price, although I haven't yet washed it so cannot comment on the long term quality. Stitching quality is on the cheaper side, but fabric similar to Nuna's original sheet. Overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Stains are difficult and time consuming to remove
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fee and thickness of this sheet. But it is so difficult to get simple stains out. I stain treat and rewards multiple times to get milk stain spills out every single time I wash these. Aggravating. Sad because I live the other aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Thick, soft, fits Graco Pack-n-Play
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are thick and buttery-soft, and large enough to comfortably fit our Graco Pack-n-Play mattress (unlike other fitted sheets out there that claim to fit, but are far too small). Really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuna Sena full-size bassinet and playard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Nuna Sena bassinet and playard (full size, not mini), and the sheets fit fine, even after washing. Great quality at an terrific price. Much better than the super expensive sheets sold by Nuna!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Ciaccio

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet if you have a narrow mattress
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sheet, so soft and not too dark, washes very well; but the width of the sheet is way too narrow for a standard crib mattress. Bought with the American Baby Company mattress pad, and that one fits like a dream. Have a few of these sheets and they are all way too narrow so the seams of the pocket lie on the top surface of the mattress and side mattress is very visible. I've now replaced most of these with some nice organic muslin sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fits nuna sena alright
customer_reviews.text: Not a perfect fit but much cheaper than the "official" cover sold by nuna. The fabric is pretty decent though.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ce.

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet in a hard to find color
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice crib sheet. The material is super soft and heavier than I expected. It feels like good quality and has held up well to a few washes so far. We have two crib mattresses and it fits both a tiny bit looser than I'd like, but as long as I tuck the excess under the mattress it stays snug. The sage color is true to the photo. If I need to buy more sheets, these are the ones I'll go for.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: ...fits Dream On Me 3" mattress...
customer_reviews.text: snuggly, but it works. Before wash, I tried it out the fit on the mattress, and it was quite loose. However, it shrunk significantly after wash/dry and now fits the mattress exactly (with no more room to shrink)—hopefully, it will not shrink anymore after the this first wash. The mattress I use this with is the Dream On Me 3" that fits the Graco Pack n Play. I did notice a slight odd scent when i first too it out of its package. It is fine after first wash. The cotton is nice and soft—great knit cotton texture.
customer_reviews.author: emleigha

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet. I bought it for a memory foam pack and play mattress since we're using it for a crib and the pad that came with it is so hard. The sheet is super soft and a nice neutral color. I am ordering a second one, now that I know I like it, so I have one to change out while i wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Chicco Lullago
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet! After months of trying to find a sheet that fits the Chicco Lullago, I decided to give this one a try. All other sheets were too small or big and this one fits perfectly. I couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is so soft, our son loved snuggling on it. We used the pack-n-play for the first few weeks until we got a crib and I ordered several of these sheets to give the baby a softer surface to lie on. I absolutely love this sheet: the color is nice, the fit is perfect, it's easy to get on and off and it washes well. You don't have to look any further for a perfect pack-n-play sheet. The sheet also fit the ancient port-o-crib in my mother's house and it has fit all the hotel cribs we've used.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Balsam

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality, but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with the purchase but it was a bit tight for my 3” mini crib mattress. Maybe it shrunk but if it did I believe it would still be right. Probably perfect for a1” mini crib mattress. I got this an an add on so it was an awesome deal. It is great quality and soft. I’d love one for my queen sized bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mely B

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for my grandson who slept well unlike at another ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my grandson who slept well unlike at another grandparent's house with another portable crib type. I used it with the Dream on Me foam mattress and it fit very well. I made doubly sure it wouldn't pull out by putting those elastic "suspender" type bands used for the corners of bed sheets (but they fit across the entire shorter side of the mattress of the portacrib) since my daughter is very insistent that there be no gaps or loose bedding because of the suffocation risk.
customer_reviews.author: cyssf

customer_reviews.title: Softer, Safer, Sheet.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids and the last one is using this sheet now. I have had many crib sheets over the years (7) and various brands and styles. I learned: Organic cottons sheets hold up much better than anything else. This sheet is good quality. Holds it shape better and feels nicer over time. Do yourself and your young one a favor and spend a little more to get an organic cotton sheet. I don't think you will regret it. I certainly haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Tortuga

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, but the green is much lighter and brighter than what is pictured. It also is see through, I can see the pattern of the mattress though the fabric. But overall I will keep it is is soft, and fits the matress pretty well. But I had to order another to match the decor in the nursery..but this will be a great backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my sons mini crib and they’re so so soft and luxurious. They’re a little small but we’re easy to stretch over his mini crib mattress. I’ve only washed them once so not sure how they will hold up with time but I am very happy with the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonreview

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my Arm's Reach co-sleeper and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Arm's Reach co-sleeper and they are SO much less expensive than the official sheets. They are tough to stretch on to the little co-slepper mattress, but honestly, it maybe takes 30 more seconds to get it all snug and since I change these every night or two it's worth it ... I bought 4 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeebee

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Basic
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a mini-crib, but they also fit my daughter’s pack-n-play. I do also use an American Baby mattress pad underneath, so that the surface is warmer and softer than the sheet alone would be.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This pack n play sheet is awesome! It is so soft and washes up really well. I liked it so much I bought two more of the same sheet and just rotate when washing. Most pack n play sheets at the store are so stiff and scratchy and this sheet is super soft and my baby loves sleeping in his pack n play!
customer_reviews.author: A. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice organic sheets
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Love that they are organic 100% cotton. They fit my 18x36 cradle mattress and my changing pad. Super soft, nice ivory color. I’ve washed them a ton of times and they only have a tiny bit of pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Super soft sheet
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets. Very soft. Almost a flannel like material.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a mattress pad cover for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a mattress pad cover for the Summer Infant Classic Comfort Wood bassinet (Fox and Friends). It seemed to big when I first bought it but it shrunk a lot after washing and going through the dryer (low heat, I never do medium or high heat for anything). It fits the mattress well now.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Soft Like Your Little One!
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet is very soft and even after dozens and dozens of washes maintains it's softness with no peeling or balling of the fabric. Before buying this sheet, I had purchased other brands and have found this to be the best by far. It fits my pack n play mattress perfectly and even my very strong baby cannot pull the edges up because it fits so securely. I recommend this product and would and will buy again. It arrived very quickly with my Amazon Prime trial.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality, Colors aren't pictured accurately
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this isn't getting five stars is that I ordered the "sage" green which is pictured as a more muted, earthy green (like sage) but I received a brighter, almost pastel lime green. It's green, just not the green pictured. I am keeping it due to the cost, quality and softness. It is too inexpensive to worry about returning just to change color. It is still super soft and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: bstutes

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby isn't quite here yet, but I just purchased this sheet for her pack & play. It was one of the cheapest I saw, and organic, so I couldn't resist. Do not hesitate to get this -- it is SO soft and does not feel poorly made at all! I will update once in use if there are any issues, or any difficulty with how it holds up, but I really do not anticipate any issues! Update: just as I expected, it is holding up well and our newborn seems to like sleeping on the soft fabric. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MB49

customer_reviews.title: ... for my arms reach co sleeper and it fits wonderfully! Nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my arms reach co sleeper and it fits wonderfully! Nice and snug! I purchased 2 sheets and have been washing and drying them for over 8 months and they haven't shrunk yet. No holes or loose threads either. Definitely great quality and super soft!
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: Love it for 3" Pack n Play Mattress!  So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Received this to go along with the Dream On Me 3" Pack n Play Mattress and it is perfect! The texture is soft enough that the baby slept comfortably throught the night! This fitted sheet fit wonderfully... not too tight and not too loose. Easy to put on the mattress. I also had Circo Pack n Play fitted sheets, but not only were those a rather tight fit, but they were very stiff to the touch. This set resolved that issue and I may be buying a second set as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet for the Graco Pack N Play. I also bought a mattress for the Pack N Play, which this sheet fits perfectly. It is a great off-white color which matches my Pack N Play. The baby we bought this for sleeps just as well in the Pack N Play on this sheet/mattress combo as she does in her own crib. The sheet is soft and feels like a thick t-shirt; I wouldn't mind sleeping on this fabric if they made this sheet in queen sized. In my opinion, you can't go wrong with this sheet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried being jersey knit it would be a bit loose on the mattress but after washing, it actually fit perfectly with not loose fabric. it is soft and cozy feeling. The only negative is that it is NOT "sage" at all. It is actually much lighter like an easter pastel green. If you are looking for it to be darker like sage, this is not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Hfaye

customer_reviews.title: Fits Arm's Reach Original Co-Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are super-soft and lovely! I washed them up yesterday in anticipation of baby's arrival, and I couldn't be happier. Of course, you should follow the washing instructions (cold and tumble dry low). We purchased these sheets in conjunction with the American Baby Company Waterproof fitted Quilted Portable/Mini Crib Mattress Pad for the Arm's Reach Original Co-sleeper. It all works great! We did order the Dream on Me 3" Extra Firm Foam Playard Mattress also to beef up the co-sleeper mattress situation, but it should all fit just fine. Finally, the natural muslin color of these sheets looks very nice with the Cream Co-Sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: stinky! there are better sheets out there
customer_reviews.text: These smell very strongly of some kind of plastic. Everything I washed them with smells like plastic now too! These are very soft but unless I can get the smell out, they are pretty much unusable. The Under The Nile sheets are softer and have no smell. Also the Naturepedic sheets have no smell but are not as soft as Under The Nile.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy but soft, fit dream on me extra firm mattress well
customer_reviews.text: The description has measurement of 39x27 which is bigger than the mattress (25.5x37.5) so I was a bit worried. I put the sheet on once arrived because the sheet is stretchy it fits ok w slightly loose feeling. However after I washed the sheet w low dry, the fabric has a little tighter feeling n fit the mattress perfectly like one of the customer pictures posted. The material is scretchy cotton unlike the regular bed sheet but I guess that gives it flexibility for diff size of mattress and it's quite soft and thick. Happy w my purchase overall, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yardener

customer_reviews.title: Works with our Summer Infant Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with our Summer Infant Classic Comfort Wood bassinet (Fox and Friends). Wash and dry it in a dryer before using for optimum fit. It's very comfy and soft for baby, and a great improvement wrapped on top of the provided mattress cover, without sacrificing safety (since it fits properly).
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, large enough to fit over a mattress topper!!
customer_reviews.text: Washed well and is on the pnp mattress as we speak. I thought bedding was so easy - turns out it is not so easy to find sheets that will fit pack n play's with toppers!! I have the. I am happy with this product and love that it is organic since it will be on my baby's skin over the. Other items have had to go back, but this combo is working right now. Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: April Antoniou

customer_reviews.title: Very soft when new, but thin and wear down quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great when new. Very soft, but also very thin. Because of that, they don't hold up well and usually start to pill 2-3 months in. I've purchased these a couple times now to replace old ones because of that. Why did I keep on buying even though they wore down quickly? Quite frankly because they are cheaper than other organic crib sheets you can buy on Amazon. I also recently purchased the "Magnolia Organics Fitted Crib Sheet" to try them out. They cost 50% more, but first impressions are that they are much thicker and higher quality. I hope they hold up better!
customer_reviews.author: wickedlfe

customer_reviews.title: My sons like to rub their cheeks on the sheet when they ...
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play organic cotton sheet is so soft and doesn't give my babies mild cheek abrasion when they sleep unlike other cotton sheets I've tried. My sons like to rub their cheeks on the sheet when they move their head left or right which causes the pinkish, dryness on their cheeks. The sheet washes well and does fit my Graco On the Go pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Baby Bjorn Travel Crib
customer_reviews.text: For anyone wondering, this sheet DOES fit the Baby Bjorn Travel Crib. I just received this sheet and my Bjorn Travel crib in the mail today, and the first thing I did was try on the sheet. The sheet feels very soft, softer than my Kushies brand sheet. Hoping that it will hold up through washes. Will update if I have a problem. Only disappointment is that it's made in China. :(
customer_reviews.author: mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is sooo soft!!! Much softer than any other crib sheet I’ve purchased. I washed it for the first time & just put it on the crib. I like the color, it’s lighter than I thought it would be, but still a nice shade of green. I would definitely recommend these sheets! I love that they are organic cotton too. We will see how they hold up with time/use. Good price for what seems to be a good quality sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Nottelmann

customer_reviews.title: I loved these for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for 6 months, and then they shrank. But they only shrank lengthwise, so now I have short fat sheets, both these and the flannel ones. I can stuff them on the crib mattress still, so I keep them around for back up, but I replaced them with some from Babies R us that haven't shrank, after 18 months of use. And I wash cold, dry on low.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Super soft comfy sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are great crib sheets! They are very soft and durable too. I've had others,especially muslin ones that simply don't last long because they aren't well made. These hold up to tons of hot water washings. They are also organic which I feel good about. I don't want my kids breathing in nasty chemicals as they sleep. They are also roomy so if you have a thicker crib mattress or have a thick mattress pad like we do it'll fit over it just fine. Awesome sheets
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: The Best, fits snugly over your customized padding
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST! Don't waste your time with another sheet. It stretches, its soft, and its organic. It will fit over a pack-and-play mattress, or any other use-at-your-own-risk padding like a quilt or mattress topper. (Pro tip: a Twin XL mattress topper can be cut to pad 3 pack-and-plays). The sheet actually fitting over everything keeps adventurous tots from sticking their arms and stuffed animals between the layers.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet started out too small for the mini crib mattress and then it shrank in the wash. Threads are unraveling and I have only washed it once.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Gelinne

customer_reviews.title: very soft! love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these organic sheets and so does my infant son. The sheets are cream colored and are extremely soft. They fit nice and snug on my mini-crib mattress (DaVinci crib with Babyletto mattress). I would recommend these to anyone who has a DaVinci or Babyletto mini-crib. The sheet is also able to fit on my Pack-N-Play. I have washed out sheet several times and it is still just as soft as ever.
customer_reviews.author: lelia west

customer_reviews.title: The only fitted crib sheet you will ever need.  Wish they made these for my cal king, xl twin, and twin beds!
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft (almost feel like jersey knit), wash up well, and are stretchy. I have a thicker crib mattress, and though it is a snug fit, they do fit and stay put. My baby loves them. I can't recommend these enough. So pleased with my purchase that I bought 3. Two natural in color and one in a soft mint green color.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDutchRaider

customer_reviews.title: Feeling good about organic,,,
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who is very "green". I was a little concerned as some reviews stated they "shrunk" slightly. But the softness quality seemed to be worth the risk. I suggested she take them out of the dryer slightly damp. I am a traveling nanny and am always looking at the quality of products in the nurseries I work. I recently came to visit my daughter and of course went straight to the crib to check it out! I was so impressed with the softness and she said after many washings, has had no problem with shrinkage. A decent price for a quality sheet.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveling Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the new mattress that I bought for my Graco pack n play and they are so soft and comfy! I bought the Dream on Me 3" foam pack n play mattress at the same time. They are perfect together!
customer_reviews.author: susieQ

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: We got a mattress for our Graco Pack and Play so that we could use the Angelcare monitor in it -- the sensor goes under the mattress. This sheet fits the mattress and the Pack and Play perfectly. It is extremely soft and very high quality. We were so impressed we bought a second one, and were especially impressed after using the fitted sheet sold by Graco itself -- which was really poor quality and an all-around pain in the neck due to the clumsy, almost non-functional design of the fitted corners. This sheet was a real pleasure after that negative experience. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new grandbaby. I wanted a really soft sheet but was worried about all of the comments I read about the smell. It came packaged in a cloth-like bag inside a plastic bag. There was a little odor but it was gone after using Dreft in the laundry wash cycle. This is the second sheet we have purchased from this company. The first one is two years old and is still soft and fits the pack and play mattress great. It is washed on cold in the delicate cycle bit does go in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: story lover

customer_reviews.title: Fits with a mattress pad on top of mattress
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the summer in my child's crib. We have a thicker velvety sheet for the winter. The material is super soft and VERY stretchy. It did shrink a little after washing and drying but not so much where it didn't fit. We have a 1.5" memory foam mattress pad on top of the mattress with a waterproof cover on top. This goes over the waterproof cover. We have not experienced any pilling from many washings and has held up.
customer_reviews.author: BigBlueFish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, just one gripe.
customer_reviews.text: I use this fitted sheet on my son's Naturepedic crib mattress. I am always looking for organic options for my family and this crib sheet is just wonderful! It is super soft, washes up nicely, and the price is great too! The only gripe I have is that when I put my wool mattress protector under the sheet the seams don't line up with the edges of the mattress, the sheet seems to be a bit too small for both the mattress and the wool protector.
customer_reviews.author: SnowedUnder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Love that it's made with organic cotton, it fits my pack and play mattress perfectly and feels soft. Satisfied with this purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Chicco

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying such a cheap organic sheet, but I bought one and quickly turned around to buy another. Works great for my Babyletto mini crib. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Quality and soft even after washing
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and seems to be quality sheet. I am not a huge a fan of purchasing items such as this online since I prefer to be able to feel before I buy. I am very satisfied and would purchase again. I have not had to clean/remove stains as of yet so cannot comment on that. But seemed to wash very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as the regular crib sheets! Fit my Graco Pack N' Play very well, although it is stretchier than the Koala Baby sheets I got from BRU. One of those is already ripping after three months, but this is still in great shape. Very, very soft and snuggly. It washes up nice and doesn't shrink in the dryer, even on high heat. I wash in hot water, too. It's a nice neutral color and would go with anything.
customer_reviews.author: FatOrangeTabby

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Deceptive coloring.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great sheet. But the color is not at all what it looks to be. I thought it would be a little darker. But it’s soft and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvs

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to use for our Chicco pack n play which was used as a bassinet to keep our baby in our room for a couple of months. I wanted to make sure I found something safe and comfortable for her and this was just what I was looking for! Regular fitted sheets can't compare to this organic cotton fabric which is comparable to a really soft t-shirt. It also held up really well after several washes. I do wish it came in some other colors, but would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: singsang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, very soft. Love!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for the Dream on Me 3 inch foam play yard mattress (which I use on top of the Graco Pack n Play original mattress pad)! I love that it's organic cotton because my babies love to drool and lick their play yard floor. It is so soft. It has made me feel a lot better about putting my baby in the Pack n Play for longer periods of time and he is happier!
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality crib-sheet that fits my Arms Reach EZ Euro Mini-Sleeper well. I like that it's organic cotton and a natural cream color. Good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: renaissance woman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sheet, Some Shrinking
customer_reviews.text: I bought both this crib sheet and the. I opened the package and tested the sheet with the mattress pad over our standard-size mattress before washing. Very soft and roomy! Then I washed on a cold delicate cycle and dried on a delicate cycle. When I put them back on, both were still soft and fit, but noticeably more snug. Despite the extra effort required to make the bed, the sheet had enough stretch to make it work, so I'm not disappointed. I plan to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: lilspringchicken

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft!! My baby hasn't arrived yet but I feel so safe having him use these because they are 100% cotton and smell completely free of any chemicals with one wash. The packaging is great; easy to take take care of and toss straight into the washer machine. I highly recommend these. First American Baby Company product I've tried so far but will definitely be purchasing other products from this company soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey K

customer_reviews.title: Natural, Soft & Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The American Baby Company 100% Organic Cotton Fitted Pack N Play sheets come exactly as described! I love them! I bout a couple in "Natural" to fit my Dream on Me Graco Pack N Play Mattress. They fit! I haven't had any problems with the edges coming off while my son sleeps. I throw them in the washer and dryer and they haven't shrank! They are also the only sheets I have found that will fit the mattress I bought for our pack n play. Basically these are great for someone who wants a sheet that is organic and best for delicate skin. Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Kurstin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not sage
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is a light mint green not sage. The pic is true sage color.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Not The Color Pictured
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was very soft but didn't match the theme for my baby's room. It's a muted soft green in the pic above but is more of a light mint green in person. Have to return unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Majesty Rose

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these sheets seemed fine but they had a strong chemical smell. The plastic bag they came in smelled the same so perhaps the smell went from the bag to the sheets. I washed them once and think the smell got less bad but I was still not willing to put them on a crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rynda

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation! Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: When you read the product description, it states the country of origin USA. This is not true! The label on the actual sheets says it's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit thick (5inch) mini crib mattresses. Additionally, the fabric seems to pill/attract fuzzies and stray hairs and ends up looking a bit gray and unclean.
customer_reviews.author: OptimisticPancake

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sheet. I have used them for over 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sheet. I have used them for over 2 years and they've held up very well even to multiple washes. Now that my daughter is much older I love to use this sheet to hold down the "padding" I create in her pack and play with several quilts and blankets. The pack and play's board is just too hard for a toddler and thus I layer several flat quilts, etc and stretch this sheet over it all to hold it tight. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: sagen'jade

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Was not the right color as shown on the description. The color is not Sage and is not alike a mint to lime colored. Not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: They stretch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet for our original size co-sleeper. They do fit, but my daughter developed a habit of pulling the sheet so she could have a little sheet in her fist while she sucks her thumb, super adorable, but it is now a requirement that where ever she sleeps she must be able to pull on the sheet. To date, I haven't been able to offer a replacement blanket for my daughter. The sheet itself is super comfy feeling, but it definitely stretches over time.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferK.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, soft, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal, so I have three of them. It's nice to have two in reserve when I need to wash.
customer_reviews.author: nekokoko

customer_reviews.title: soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: well made, organic cotton sheets. they fit perfectly on the dream on me foam pack n play mattress. they wash and dry beautifully and still fit the mattress very well after many washings. they are soft and cozy and are much nicer than any other pack n play sheet i've ever purchased. very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Love the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Thick, soft and seems like a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I debated whether organic cotton would really make a difference. What a difference it makes! I bought designer sheets with my first. This time around I just wanted comfortable. The cotton is thicker (In a nice way) and so soft after just one wash. I think it'll be a great value and last the duration.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Handler

customer_reviews.title: This worked for my little one
customer_reviews.text: When my 4 month old started teething, sleeping became pretty much impossible. He slept all night with this mattress, the first time in a long time. The mattress fit my play trend perfectly. I bought this mattress with desperation. I did read all the reviews, some of the reviews did worry me. I made sure I had the correct measurements before I made my purchase. This mattress works, my only advice if you want a perfect fit is to make sure you take all the correct measurements.
customer_reviews.author: chm

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these sheets but kind of wish ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these sheets but kind of wish I would've looked elsewhere. It is soft and I appreciate that it's organic but the sheet shrinks after the first washing. I no longer know which way it should go because it doesn't fit correctly anymore. I just stretch and pull it which gets the job done but is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets to use on a road trip for my 18 month old son. They are incredibly soft and thick. I was actually surprised at the quality for the price! Glad I bought these. They are wonderful and I'm sure made his sleep for two weeks more comfortable. They are so soft I may see if they make some for cribs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guptill

customer_reviews.title: Love this sheet!
customer_reviews.text: We have the Graco Pack 'N Play with Newborn Napper Elite. This sheet fits perfectly! It's nice and snug and hasn't slipped at all. Our daughter moves quite a bit in her sleep and this sheet stays put! It's soft and just what I wanted for her to sleep on. I've washed it several times and it hasn't pilled or changed shape or anything. I definitely recommend this sheet. Two years later and I bought a second sheet for my second daughter. Still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: PACK & PLAY PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sheet for a pack and play. Cleans nice and fits well. Ours was purchased in 2013 and I’m finally reviewing it in 2018, still in great shape after heavy use
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyefanjustin

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to dry.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cotton sheet which fit the Pack N Play perfectly. That part was great, nice and soft, and I thought I'd made a great purchase. I prewashed before using....it washed nicely, but I had to run it through the dryer 5 times and still it was damp so I had to hang it up over the shower curtain rod to finish drying (for two more days). If you are going to use this item, I suggest you buy several so you have time to dry them before having to use the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Granny 3

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! They're soooo soft, and I love that they're organic. I had registered for a bunch of adorable (and expensive) bedding from Land of Nod & Aden & Anais, and instead ended up using these American Baby sheets for our crib, Pack n Play, and the mini crib at my parents' house. I felt like my little guy was getting kind of cold with the muslin sheets, and these are even softer and organic to boot! I'll definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Akemi012

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely thhe best crib sheet I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely thhe best crib sheet I've owned. I've bought several different organic sheets but this one is my favorite. It fits theorganic crib mattresses great which I know some have said were soemwhat larger than standard but this fit great. It's also super soft. I loved putting my daughter down on these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Shrank considerably
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit Baby Bjorn travel crib. The non-organic version of this sheet was said to fit Baby Bjorn and they are of the same size (24"x38"). I put the sheet on before wash and saw that it fit great, and then I took it off to wash -- normal wash, low heat drying. Now it is small to the point that if it's any smaller I will not be able to use it. There is one end the sheet just could not cover completely. It is still usable. We use the travel crib for naps so it's okay. The material is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good price - a little thin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack n play sheet to fit our. The material is quite soft as you would expect though quite thin. But I suspect for a $9.99 pack n play sheet this is about as good as it gets. I haven't washed this yet so I cannot comment on any shrinking problems but I think I will most likely let it air-dry just to avoid potential shrinkage. I plan on buying one extra as a back up!
customer_reviews.author: DesignerMama

customer_reviews.title: Soft! But weird seams
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is sooooo soft. It washed beautifully. I love the creamy, ivory color. My only complaint is that there are seams on the long sides. Is this normal for a crib sheet? They don't exactly fit the lines of our mattress and it doesn't look great. I can't imagine it will feel great once baby is rolling around either. It's not enough to send it back; but beware. Otherwise I LOVE this sheet. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable and lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on Pack N Play and have held up well through multiple washings.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sleypen

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for our Graco Pack N Play since the sheet is organic. But then realized that Graco uses flame retardants in its pack n play. So even though we love the sheet, we ended up getting rid of it and the pack and play and using our Naturepedic crib mattress/DaVinci convertible toddler bed instead.
customer_reviews.author: Health Conscious Mama

customer_reviews.title: By Far the best sheets out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets. Extremely soft and easy to put on. They have withheld numerous washes and are still great quality. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Randy H

customer_reviews.title: These fit the mattress well and are soft. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets initially fit the mattress well and are soft. I even bought 2 more. They ended up stretching out after 6 months of use. Would not recommend buying. It bunched up on the baby's crib which is not safe. Wish they were better as the material itself is soft and good for colder nights. Will try another brand. Baby Bargains recommended this brand - disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

product_meta.title: American Baby Company Knit Fitted Crib Sheet Made with Organic Cotton in Natural Color, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description: Size:CribOur crib sheet fabric is made with 100% organic cotton and fits standard size 28 X 52 crib mattresses and toddler beds . The unique 3 panel construction with 9 deep corner pockets provide a smooth secure fit. Can be machine washed cold with like colors, mild detergent, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: Sheet fabric made with 100% organic cotton
Measures 28" X 52" X 9", Fits up to 6 inch thick mattresses
Elastic all around for a snug and secure fit
From a trusted Amazon supplier since 2007

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,682 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
